channel.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Microsoft 365 Platform Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 31st of May, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.

Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Build your own Microsoft Teams using Microsoft Graph Toolkit and .NET Core API and Integrate using Web Components
item.description: Business Case Teams chat is a great communication tool that is adopted worldwide.
Business Case Teams chat is a great communication tool that is adopted worldwide.
item.dc:creator: Sohil Bhalla

item.title: CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3
item.description: We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
We’ve just published a new major version of the CLI for Microsoft 365 with new commands for working with and managing Microsoft 365 and SharePoint Framework projects on any platform.
item.dc:creator: Patrick Lamber

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 168
item.description: Microsoft Graph team PM Sébastien Levert, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss delivering great customer experiences, importance of data in product development decisionmaking, tips to prospective Product Managers, and latest articles/videos (many Build related) from Microsoft and Community.

Microsoft Graph team PM Sébastien Levert, joins Microsoft’s Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss delivering great customer experiences, importance of data in product development decisionmaking, tips to prospective Product Managers, and latest articles/videos (many Build related) from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 26th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.

Demos - Independent Publishing Connectors Case - Netherland Railroads, Data Loss Prevention (DLP) solution for emails with Microsoft Graph, and TeamsFx .NET - Use SQLite and generic forms for your next Teams Dev demo. Released MGT v2.5.2, 3 script samples.

item.title: List Formatting - View the contents of a file with file preview card
item.description: Have you ever opened and checked each file or page in the Document Library or Site Pages one by one to find the desired file or page?
Have you ever opened and checked each file or page in the Document Library or Site Pages one by one to find the desired file or page?
item.dc:creator: Tetsuya Kawahara

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 167
item.description: Valo Solutions’ developer, PnP PowerShell maintainer and MVP Gautam Sheth, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how employers may look at open-source, keeping up with product changes and what’s next for PowerShell? Latest articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.

Valo Solutions’ developer, PnP PowerShell maintainer and MVP Gautam Sheth, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss how employers may look at open-source, keeping up with product changes and what’s next for PowerShell? Latest articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 24th of May, 2022
item.description: The format and recording for today’s call was altered due to Microsoft Build 2022. In the recorded 15 minutes, Microsoft’s Viva Connections ISV benefits program was outlined after which the community separately viewed Satya Nadella’s Build keynote and shared thoughts in chat.

The format and recording for today’s call was altered due to Microsoft Build 2022. In the recorded 15 minutes, Microsoft’s Viva Connections ISV benefits program was outlined after which the community separately viewed Satya Nadella’s Build keynote and shared thoughts in chat.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Power App for Time Sheeting
item.description: Community Sample Timesheet App This blog explains how I created a time sheet app in Power Apps.
Community Sample Timesheet App This blog explains how I created a time sheet app in Power Apps.
item.dc:creator: Darren Lutchner

item.title: How to use the Power Platform developer plan with the Microsoft 365 Developer program
item.description: What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.

What is Microsoft 365 Developer Account? The Microsoft 365 Developer Program includes a Microsoft 365 E5 developer subscription that you can use to create your own sandbox and develop solutions independent of your production environment.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Irabor

item.title: Power Platform Community Call – May 2022
item.description: Demos: Automatically generate technical documentation of your Power Apps and Power Automate Flows, Streamline Annual Document Reviews with Power Apps, and Power Platform and Microsoft Teams- Create a ‘back-channel’​ internal chat for any meeting. Articles and trainings reviewed.

Demos: Automatically generate technical documentation of your Power Apps and Power Automate Flows, Streamline Annual Document Reviews with Power Apps, and Power Platform and Microsoft Teams- Create a ‘back-channel’​ internal chat for any meeting. Articles and trainings reviewed.
item.dc:creator: David Warner II

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 19th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos: Building Office Locations Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension with SPF, and Using Adaptive Cards Designer control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions. Released PnPjs Client-Side Libraries v3.3.2 GA and CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3.0 beta.

Demos: Building Office Locations Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension with SPF, and Using Adaptive Cards Designer control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions. Released PnPjs Client-Side Libraries v3.3.2 GA and CLI for Microsoft 365 v5.3.0 beta.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Adaptive Cards community call – May 2022
item.description: Featured demo - Handling multi-user responses for Adaptive Cards in Teams – posting a card with Power Automate in a Teams meeting chat. The card can handle multiple responses and adds tasks to Planner. Q&A deep dive aligned to demo.

Featured demo - Handling multi-user responses for Adaptive Cards in Teams – posting a card with Power Automate in a Teams meeting chat. The card can handle multiple responses and adds tasks to Planner. Q&A deep dive aligned to demo.
item.dc:creator: J.P. Roca

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 166
item.description: Microsoft Principal PM Lead, DevDiv - Pierce Boggan, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss career journey, people management, optimizing developer experiences, creating apps with Teams Toolkit, 3 new Teams Toolkit features, plus articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.

Microsoft Principal PM Lead, DevDiv - Pierce Boggan, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss career journey, people management, optimizing developer experiences, creating apps with Teams Toolkit, 3 new Teams Toolkit features, plus articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 17th of May, 2022
item.description: Two demos - Integrate Microsoft Graph connector content on Office.com, and Your Microsoft 365 app within the fingertips of employees with Viva Connections. Announced new training - Writing for the Web, 5 articles, and 1 Teams bot sample.

Two demos - Integrate Microsoft Graph connector content on Office.com, and Your Microsoft 365 app within the fingertips of employees with Viva Connections. Announced new training - Writing for the Web, 5 articles, and 1 Teams bot sample.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Office Add-ins community call – May 11, 2022
item.description: Topics: AppSource Add-in Validation Improvements, Blazor in Office Add-ins (Demo), Add-in command changes (reminder to register add-ins commands that use ExecuteFunction by October 30) and Community ideas (feedback wanted). Q&A in chat and at end of call.

Topics: AppSource Add-in Validation Improvements, Blazor in Office Add-ins (Demo), Add-in command changes (reminder to register add-ins commands that use ExecuteFunction by October 30) and Community ideas (feedback wanted). Q&A in chat and at end of call.
item.dc:creator: David Chesnut

item.title: Adam Wójcik and Martin Lingstuyl join CLI for Microsoft 365 maintainers team
item.description: We’re excited to announce that Adam Wójcik and Martin Lingstuyl are joining CLI for Microsoft 365 as maintainers!
We’re excited to announce that Adam Wójcik and Martin Lingstuyl are joining CLI for Microsoft 365 as maintainers!
item.dc:creator: Waldek Mastykarz

item.title: Microsoft 365 & Power Platform Development Community call - 12th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos: How to build a SSO bot using yo teams for Microsoft Teams, List formatting magic – Advance discussion board formatting with Power Automate, and Taking advantage of new multi-lingual capabilities in list formatting. Released Yo teams previews, 3 scripts, 1 Teams sample!

Demos: How to build a SSO bot using yo teams for Microsoft Teams, List formatting magic – Advance discussion board formatting with Power Automate, and Taking advantage of new multi-lingual capabilities in list formatting. Released Yo teams previews, 3 scripts, 1 Teams sample!
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Office Add-ins community call – April 13, 2022
item.description: Call Summary This month’s community call features demos on Ribbon API updates (previewing enable/disable ribbon buttons and contextual tabs for PowerPoint and Word) – Abid Rahman, Program Manager (Microsoft) & Preethika Kiruveedula, Program Manager (Microsoft), PowerPoint selection APIs (previewing 17 new APIs for getting and setting slides, shapes and text range in PowerPoint) – Onur Onder, Senior Software Engineer (Microsoft) & Camille Birch, Product Manager (Microsoft), and Add-ins on Appointment read surface on Outlook Mobile (previewing appointment organizer APIs for logging event details to 3rd party applications) – Jatin Guptam, Program Manager (Microsoft).

Call Summary This month’s community call features demos on Ribbon API updates (previewing enable/disable ribbon buttons and contextual tabs for PowerPoint and Word) – Abid Rahman, Program Manager (Microsoft) & Preethika Kiruveedula, Program Manager (Microsoft), PowerPoint selection APIs (previewing 17 new APIs for getting and setting slides, shapes and text range in PowerPoint) – Onur Onder, Senior Software Engineer (Microsoft) & Camille Birch, Product Manager (Microsoft), and Add-ins on Appointment read surface on Outlook Mobile (previewing appointment organizer APIs for logging event details to 3rd party applications) – Jatin Guptam, Program Manager (Microsoft).
item.dc:creator: David Chesnut

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 165
item.description: Finland-based MVP Laura Kokkarinen, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss Laura’s architecturally focused work and blog posts, in-person vs remote events, tips to becoming an MVP and Finnish Lake seals. Showcased 13 articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.

Finland-based MVP Laura Kokkarinen, joins Vesa Juvonen and Waldek Mastykarz to discuss Laura’s architecturally focused work and blog posts, in-person vs remote events, tips to becoming an MVP and Finnish Lake seals. Showcased 13 articles/videos from Microsoft and Community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 10th of May, 2022
item.description: Demos this week - Extend your Teams Search Based Message Extension to Outlook and Getting started on using Azure Communication Services in your web site. Released Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – May 2022 update + articles, documents, videos, podcasts and more.

Demos this week - Extend your Teams Search Based Message Extension to Outlook and Getting started on using Azure Communication Services in your web site. Released Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) – May 2022 update + articles, documents, videos, podcasts and more.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) - May 2022 update
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) May 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.
Microsoft 365 Platform Community (PnP) May 2022 update is out with a summary of the latest guidance, samples, and solutions from Microsoft or from the community for the community.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 5th of May, 2022
item.description: Three demos Manage data in OneDrive application folder, Using Adaptive Cards control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions, and SPFx Design Patterns – Property pane exception handling. Released React Controls v3.8.0, Reusable Controls v3.7.0 and 4 samples!

Three demos Manage data in OneDrive application folder, Using Adaptive Cards control from the PnP control gallery in SPFx solutions, and SPFx Design Patterns – Property pane exception handling. Released React Controls v3.8.0, Reusable Controls v3.7.0 and 4 samples!
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen
item.category: Microsoft Viva and SPFx community call

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - 3rd of May, 2022
item.description: Three demos - Extend your Microsoft Teams app to Outlook and Office, Introducing new M365 Assessment Tool with SharePoint Syntex Module, and Run Office Scripts with a button- now in Excel for Windows. Review latest articles, documents, and podcasts.

Three demos - Extend your Microsoft Teams app to Outlook and Office, Introducing new M365 Assessment Tool with SharePoint Syntex Module, and Run Office Scripts with a button- now in Excel for Windows. Review latest articles, documents, and podcasts.
item.dc:creator: Vesa Juvonen

item.title: How to contribute to this blog
item.description: Everyone’s voice matters! We want to publish your content on all things you build with code, low-code, no-code on and around Microsoft 365.
Everyone’s voice matters! We want to publish your content on all things you build with code, low-code, no-code on and around Microsoft 365.
item.dc:creator: Luise Freese
